content: ***about this pattern*** crochet your own sleeveless vest using this crochet pattern in pdf format the available sizes are s fits bust 34 - 36″ length 20″ m fits bust 38 - 40″ length 20″ l fits bust 42 - 44″ length 21 5″ xl fits bust 46 - 48″ length 21 5″ 2xl fits bust 50 - 52″ length 23″ 3xl fits bust 54 - 56″ length 23″ 4xl fits bust 58 - 60″ length 24 5″ 5xl fits bust 62 - 64″ length 24 5″ this pattern contains written instructions in english and uses us crochet terminology the printable pdf has a total of 2 pages including the cover page available as an instant download --- ***questions & returns*** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern --- ***please note *** please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns you can find the free version here https //wilmade com/crochet-poncho-vest ***find me on social media*** patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg youtube https //www youtube com/c/wilmawestenberg #plussize #sizeinclusive
